Message:
Once we had escaped
from the burning temple,
I gently let Mother down
from my arms.

She gave me a few licks
of thanks in return...
Thank goodness...!

What’s this...?
There’s a different
scent on the wind...

So this was all a plot
to kill me off and attack
the settlement, huh...?
If we don’t act fast...!

“Messenger of Flames.
Lend me your power
once more!”

“Don’t give me some
weird nickname!
I don’t have the power
to control fire.
In fact, I...”

The girl’s hands began to tremble.
Did something bad happen
to her before?

“You’re the one who just
told me to break nature’s law
regardless of how I look.
After lighting this fire within me,
do you really want to go back
on your word so soon?”

After a moment’s hesitation,
the girl slapped both of
her cheeks and looked up at me.

In her eyes blazed the same fire
I’d seen there the day we met.

“That’s what I like to see.
What’s your name, Messenger?”

To escape with our lives,
let’s fight against fate like
the pitiful humans we are...!”
